info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:48PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Siskiyou County through 930 PM PDT... At 847 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gazelle, or 12 miles southeast of Yreka, moving northeast at 5 mph towards Interstate-5. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Traffic may become disrupted from accumulating hail. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yreka, Montague, Grenada and Gazelle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
